identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.philosophy: Organic Intelligence - Merging high-tech utility with natural, earthy warmth.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Organic warmth.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel calm and intelligent.
Content is King: Typography drives the hierarchy.
Negative Space: Generous breathing room (2x standard).
Contrast: High contrast for accessibility and visual impact.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@300;400;500;600&family=Outfit:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap');

accent.description: Sage Green - Soft backgrounds, subtle highlights

usage_rules: Never use pure white (#FFFFFF) for main backgrounds. Use #F9F9F7.
Primary color (#0F2922) is for primary actions and User chat bubbles.
Secondary color (#C66B54) is for accents, notifications, and 'spark' moments.
AI Chat bubbles should be Muted (#F2F0E9) with dark text.

spacing.base: Use Tailwind spacing scale but 2x standard (e.g., p-8 instead of p-4).

grid_system.dashboard: Mode B: High Density Grid (Compact, 4 cols)
grid_system.chat: Central focused column (max-w-3xl) with floating sidebar

buttons.animation: Hover: scale-105 transition-transform duration-200. Active: scale-95.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (border-border), no shadow by default.

inputs.style: Minimalist. bg-transparent border-b border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-none px-0 py-2.
inputs.chat_input: Pill-shaped container, bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-border shadow-sm.

chat_bubbles.system: text-xs text-muted-foreground text-center my-4 uppercase tracking-widest

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the body background (opacity 0.03).
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 for sticky headers and sidebars.
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in hero sections only (Sage to Bone).
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Regular weight for UI, Duotone for empty states).

hero_abstract.alt: Abstract organic podium with fern shadows

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Follow the 'Organic Intelligence' theme. Avoid generic SaaS templates. Use the specified color palette strictly.

pages.landing: Use the 'Tetris Grid'. Hero section must be emotional, not just functional. Use the abstract organic image.
pages.auth: Split screen. Left: Form (clean, minimal). Right: Image (Bonsai workspace) with a quote overlay.
pages.dashboard: Clean, sidebar layout. Glassmorphism sidebar. Main content area should have a subtle card effect.
pages.chat: The core experience. Focus on typography and spacing. Message bubbles should feel tactile.
pages.profile: Mask the email (d****@gmail.com). Use a clean form layout for editing.
pages.settings: Allow editing the system prompt. Use a large text area with monospace font for the prompt.

components.shadcn: Customize all Shadcn components to match the 'Organic' theme (rounded corners, specific colors).

instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text or buttons.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast.
Use 'Manrope' for UI text and 'Outfit' for headings.
All interface text must be in Spanish.
